remarks: Value of isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` when ` -. X .<_ W ` , given auxiliary atom ` Q ` .  (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dihvalcq2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihvalcq2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihvalcq2.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
dihvalcq2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihvalcq2.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihvalcq2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihvalcq2.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihvalcq2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihvalcq2.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihvalcq2 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ -. X .<_ W ) /\ ( ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ Q .<_ X ) ) -> ( I ` X ) = ( ( I ` Q ) .(+) ( I ` ( X ./\ W ) ) ) ) $.
